description:
A small piece of candy wrapped in plastic or wax paper with twists on its ends. Shape and color vary widely by platform. Facebook’s design used to resemble a classic unwrapped red-and-white peppermint. May also be called sweets or lollies.

This emoji tends to spike in use around Halloween.
apple_vendor_description: The Candy emoji on Apple devices is a delightful, vibrant treat, often depicted as a swirl of colorful hard candy. Apple's design language imbues it with a glossy, translucent quality, showcasing its smooth, rounded form and the way light reflects off its sugary surface through realistic lighting. The rich, saturated colors and subtle 3D shading make this emoji on Apple devices a sweet symbol of indulgence, celebrations, or simply a fun, delightful message.
